This is the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the farmer sowing his corn that kept the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the dog that worried the farmer sowing his corn that kept the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the cat that killed the dog that worried the farmer sowing his corn that kept the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
This is the rat that ate the cat that killed the dog that worried the farmer sowing his corn that kept the rooster that crowed in the morn that woke the malt that lay in the man all tattered and torn that kissed the cow with the crumpled horn that tossed the house that Jack built the horse and the hound and the horn that belonged to the maiden all forlorn that milked the priest all shaven and shorn that married.
